featured.text: It must be free from impurity, while exhibiting some fruitiness and creating a pleasant bitter flavor along with a peppery sensation in the mouth.
In others, words can trigger a real sensation of taste on their tongue. 31
On the other hand, plants cannot move __(29)__ and do not need to learn to avoid certain things, so this sensation would be unnecessary.

definition.en_def: A physical feeling or perception resulting from something that happens to or comes into contact with the body; also, a widespread reaction or excitement.
definition.example: The new movie created a sensation among audiences.
